name: Music & Fireworks Show
description:
Welcome to the music & fireworks show! Listen to the music while enjoying this wonderful auto-generated fireworks show! You can also hit the fireworks box to release various colors of fireworks!

Current features

VR support: Support in-situ range of exclusive VR fireworks show viewing experience.
Procedurally generated fireworks show: import your own music, the core program will independently analyze and display a fireworks show that fits.

Hit the fireworks box: hit the colorful fireworks box to release the brilliant fireworks.

Self-contained music: comes with 3 different styles of music for enjoyment.

A bunch of new features are being planned and made, so feel free to let me know if you have any questions on the Discord channel, the Steam community, or by sending me an email!

Thanks again for choosing to play the music & fireworks show!
